description: Terao Kouichi is childhood friend of http://anidb.net/ch16796 [Yousuke] and founder of the schools cycling club. He has the position of secondary captain. He is known as a "precision machine" due to the way he researches every small detail about the race conditions and major contenders. Because of this, he is the only one who can bring out Yousuke`s full power. He often mentions that he think http://anidb.net/ch6574 [Mikoto] is very cute and also admires his strength and spirit which is cabable of being a true cyclist. He is an all rounder cyclist and serves as the teams domestique.
name: Terao Kouichi
